title: Cant equip wards
body: i just bought the new pro ward and i tried to equip it but it wouldn't let me. I've tried unequiping my default wards and can't do that either. this is mac client

replies.body:
Hey there!

Alright so unfortunately this isn't a bug, just the store being slow :(  If you're on wireless this can be super slow. The ward skin will select but what you should do is click the ward you want, and just let it run for a few minutes. If it doesn't update try reloading the store, make sure to only click it once- leaving the page will cancel the platform call to swap your ward skin

Let me know if that resolves it. I was able to reproduce this but picking a different ward and just giving it a few minutes to update resolved it
